comment: It's a bit frustrating at first, but the more you learn, the more interesting you should try to finish about 1/3 of the course and you will start to feel good.

comment: The course brings a lot of useful knowledge

name: Viet Huong
comment: I am looking for an Excel course to improve my work efficiency, after researching I chose the course of Star Classes. The course is designed to be convenient for learning, the content of the lectures and exercises are very good, I can take advantage of my free time to learn a new skill, especially during the Covid epidemic. After finishing the Excel course, I will learn more courses on Star Classes.
